title: Lebensquell
description: The city's first vegetarian organic store opened its doors around 1995. Carries an abundant assortment of vegan products, has an award winning fresh produce section and a,  knowledgable staff. Stocks tofu and seitan products, vegan alternatives to dairy, caily fresh bread from local bakeries, plant based protein powders, selection of raw foods including dried fruits, nuts and seeds, superfoods, vegan chocolates, cookies, sweets, bars and snacks and a large gluten free selection. Several employees speak English. The accepted payment methods are EC-cards and cash.
